ecological_assessment.qualitative_description: The model captures most NPZ model characteristics with some variations and additional complexity, but does not perfectly match the original NPZ equation structure

nutrient_equation_uptake.explanation: Uses Michaelis-Menten kinetics (N/(K_N+N)) with temperature and light scaling. Lacks exact self-shading term, but includes light attenuation via exp(-k_w * P)

nutrient_equation_recycling.explanation: Does not directly implement the specified recycling terms (beta*lambda*P^2/(mu^2+P^2)*Z and gamma*q*Z). Instead uses detritus remineralization and temperature-dependent recycling

nutrient_equation_mixing.explanation: No explicit environmental mixing term (k*(N0-N)) present

phytoplankton_equation_growth.explanation: Captures nutrient-limited growth with Michaelis-Menten kinetics, includes temperature and light scaling. Very close to standard NPZ growth formulation

phytoplankton_equation_loss.explanation: Includes mortality (m_P * P) and predation (grazing), but with additional nutrient stress mortality term. Lacks explicit mixing loss term

zooplankton_equation.explanation: Captures predation-based growth and mortality, but with nutrient-dependent assimilation efficiency and additional nutrient stress mortality. Differs from standard NPZ formulation
